thread.title: Operation Stack 'escalated out of all proportion', says Rod Haulage Association
thread.title_full: Operation Stack 'escalated out of all proportion', says Rod Haulage Association | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Operation Stack 'escalated out of all proportion', says Rod Haulage Association
text:
Five thousand bottles of water and two hundred meals are being given to drivers as the operation enters its third day.
The heavy traffic is being caused by Calais closure for industrial action.
Richard Burnett from the Road Haulage Association spoke to ITV News Meridian earlier today.
Play video Last updated Wed 1 Jul 2015 Read more 54 updates Port of Dover reopens but Operation Stack remains in place Travel Dover
